results.content:
Updating original comment : I can say the instructor has put lot of effort to make us understand the topics as easily as possible. The instructor has covered almost all topics related to the MERN stack. He has explained every topic with examples and has tried to made it look as simple as possible. 
However, some self-exploration and Google-ing is definitely required in some areas. I treated them as homework ;)
Overall, I thank Instructor K.Sathyaprakash for his efforts, and with this course I am now pretty fluent in MERN full stack concepts. :)
